articles.author: Meryl Kornfield, Lisa Rein
articles.title: Trump plan will limit disability benefits for older Americans - The Washington Post
articles.description: Trump administration officials are considering eliminating age as a factor in deciding whether someone is capable of working.
articles.content: The Trump administration is preparing a plan that will make it harder for older Americans to qualify for Social Security disability payments, part of an overhaul of the federal safety net for poor, o… [+138 chars]
